categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Tanzu was a male Sith Pureblood who was a Sith Lord of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, where he could be found selling armor to Sith Inquisitors on Vaiken Spacedock.

Lord Tanzu appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a PvP Ranked Gear vendor for the Sith Inquisitor class on Vaiken Spacedock. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
